title: A Bittersweet Love Letter to Bly Manor
author: Five by Five Takes
comment: The real quieter tragedy is that more people haven't seen your content yet. It's consistently phenomenal.

i couldn't quite put into words why i loved jamie and dany so much but you just did. loving something not because it lasts is such a hard lesson to learn, and i hadn't made the connection of the flower shop with that concept, i just thought well duh jamie is a gardener of course they would have a flower shop. thanks for making this i will now forward it to everyone i know
idk why, but the way you explain this show and convey all your raw feelings and emotions about it makes me cry. i can just tell that you're being genuine and honest and i love it so much
this video made me realise something that i'd been trying to figure out for ages - thank you for making this. x

I’m been having similar feelings during quarantine and have been feeling pretty hopeless and like I don’t have any agency. I haven’t seen Bly Manor but now I’m thinking I should. But damn, you really know how to swing a baseball bat and bust open my heart. This is something I didn’t know I needed.
description:
cried a lot. thought a lot. here's my feelings.

how'd dani and jamie make you feel?
